alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 6:27PM CDT until August 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JEFFERSON COUNTY... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Atkinson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 1 inch hail in Fort Atkinson. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Palmyra, Lake Koshkonong, Rome, and Hebron. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
